title: File Form 1099-NEC Transmittal (Form 1096)
description: A business has issued multiple paper Forms 1099-NEC and now must file them with the IRS using the summary Form 1096.

tasks.description: Compile all the Forms 1099-NEC that were issued.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a complete set of the 1099s.

tasks.description: Calculate the total amount of payments reported on all the 1099s.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately sums up the total payments.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 1096, Annual Summary and Transmittal of U.S. Information Returns, and mail it with the copies of the 1099s.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares and sends the complete paper filing package to the IRS.
